sen.j: 工部七職（こうぶしちしょく）とは彦根仏壇の製造における、7種の工程の職人の総称。
sen.e: Kobushichishoku refers to a collective name of craftsmen engaged in seven processes in manufacturing the Hikone Buddhist altar.
Kobushichishoku refers to a collective name of craftsmen engaged in seven processes in manufacturing the Hikone Buddhist altar.
Kobushichishoku refers to a collective name of craftsmen engaged in seven processes in manufacturing the Hikone Buddhist altar.

sen.j: それぞれの工程の職人は次の通り
sen.e: A craftsman engaged in each process is as follows.
A craftsman engaged in each process is as follows.
A craftsman engaged in each process is as follows.

sen.j: 木地師（きじし）
sen.e: Kijishi (woodturner)
Kijishi (woodturner)
Kijishi (woodturner)

sen.j: 塗師（ぬし）
sen.e: Nushi (lacquer painter)
Nushi (lacquer painter)
Nushi (lacquer painter)

sen.j: 金箔押師（きんぱくおしし）
sen.e: Kinpakuoshishi (craftsman sticking gold leaf)
Kinpakuoshishi (craftsman sticking gold leaf)
Kinpakuoshishi (craftsman sticking gold leaf)

sen.j: 宮殿師（くうでんし）
sen.e: Kudenshi (craftsman assembling handmade small pieces into a roof)
Kudenshi (craftsman assembling small handmade pieces into a roof)
Kudenshi (craftsman assembling small handmade pieces into a roof)

sen.j: 彫刻師（ちょうこくし）
sen.e: Chokokushi (sculptor)
Chokokushi (sculptor)
Chokokushi (sculptor)

sen.j: 蒔絵師（まきえし）
sen.e: Makieshi (craftsman sprinkling gold or silver power, or placing shell on each lacquered part of Buddhist altar)
Makieshi (craftsman sprinkling gold or silver power, or placing shell on each lacquered part of Buddhist altar)
Makieshi (craftsman sprinkling gold or silver power, or placing shell on each lacquered part of Buddhist altar)

sen.j: 錺金具師（かざりかなぐし）
sen.e: Kazarikanagushi (chaser)
Kazarikanagushi (chaser)
Kazarikanagushi (chaser)

tit.j: 各職人の担当領域で見た、他産地との比較
tit.e: Comparison with Buddhist altars produced in other regions, from the viewpoint of field undertaken by each craftsman
Comparison with Buddhist altars produced in other regions, from the viewpoint of fields undertaken by each craftsman
Comparison with Buddhist altars produced in other regions, from the viewpoint of fields undertaken by each craftsman

sen.j: 名称の差異も存在するが、ここでは各職人の仕事内容の違いに絞り込む。
sen.e: The name differs, but, this section puts a focus on a difference in the contents of work of each craftsman.
The name differs, but, this section puts a focus on the difference in the contents of work for each craftsman.
The name differs, but, this section puts a focus on the difference in the contents of work for each craftsman.

sen.j: 「蒔絵」がなく、当然「蒔絵師」が存在しない。
sen.e: Since 'makie' is not provided, 'makieshi' does not exist naturally.
Since 'makie' is not provided, 'makieshi' does not exist naturally.
Since 'makie' (Japanese lacquer sprinkled with gold or silver powder) is not provided, 'makieshi' (a gold lacquer master) does not exist naturally.

sen.j: 「宮殿師」が存在せず、木地師が宮殿も製作する。
sen.e: Kudenshi' does not exist, and kijishi also manufactures kuden.
Kudenshi' does not exist, and kijishi also manufactures kuden.
Kudenshi' does not exist, and kijishi also manufactures kuden palace.

sen.j: 「箔押師」が存在せず、塗師が漆塗り～乾燥を終えた後に箔押しを行い、組立てまで実施する。
sen.e: Hakuoshishi' (referring to the above kinpakuoshishi) does not exist, and nushi puts gold leaf after finishing the processes from lacquering to drying, and implements assembly.
Hakuoshishi' (referring to the above kinpakuoshishi) does not exist, and nushi puts gold leaf after finishing the processes from lacquering to drying, and implements assembly.
Hakuoshishi' (craftsman of foil-stamping) does not exist, and nushi puts foil after finishing the processes from lacquering to drying, and implements assembly.

sen.j: 「宮殿師」が存在しない。
sen.e: Kudenshi' does not exist.
Kudenshi' does not exist.
Kudenshi' does not exist.

sen.j: 詳細不明。
sen.e: Details are unknown.
Details are unknown.
Details are unknown.

sen.j: 不明
sen.e: Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.

sen.j: 不明
sen.e: Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.

sen.j: 彦根では仏壇店の業務に組み込まれている最終組立てを行う「組立師」が存在する。
sen.e: Kumitateshi' exists, who conducts finishing work incorporated in the work of Buddhist altar shop in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Kumitateshi' who conduct finishing work incorporated in the work of the Buddhist altar shop in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Kumitateshi' who conduct finishing work incorporated in the work of the Buddhist altar shop in Hikone.

sen.j: 彦根で木地師が作っている「天井」を専門的に作る天井師が存在する。
sen.e: Tenjoshi exists, who is dedicated solely to making a 'ceiling' which is made by kijishi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are Tenjoshi who are dedicated solely to making a 'ceiling' which is made by kijishi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are Tenjoshi who are dedicated solely to making a 'ceiling' which is made by kijishi in Hikone.

sen.j: 彦根では塗師が行う一工程である「呂色」を専門的に行う呂色師が存在する。
sen.e: Roiroshi exists, who is dedicated solely to 'roiro' (polish) which is one of the processes conducted by nushi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are Roiroshi who are dedicated solely to 'roiro' (polish) which is one of the processes conducted by nushi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are Roiroshi who are dedicated solely to 'roiro' (polish) which is one of the processes conducted by nushi in Hikone.

sen.j: 彫刻師が前彫師（欄間を専門的に製作）と内彫師（欄間以外を製作）に分かれている。
sen.e: Chokokushi is divided into maeborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting transom) and uchiborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting parts other than transom).
Chokokushi is divided into maeborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting transom) and uchiborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting parts other than transom).
Chokokushi is divided into maeborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting transom) and uchiborishi (dedicated solely to sculpting parts other than transom).

sen.j: 錺金具師が表金具師（外側の茶系色付け金具）と内金具師（金メッキまたは消しメッキで、障子および内部の金具）に分かれている。
sen.e: Kazarikanagushi is divided into omotekanagushi (in charge of outside embrowned metal fittings) and uchikanagushi (in charge of glided or not glided metal fittings of shoji (a paper sliding door) and of the inside).

Kazarikanagushi is divided into omotekanagushi (in charge of outside embrowned metal fittings) and uchikanagushi (in charge of glided or not glided metal fittings of shoji (a paper sliding door) and of the inside).

Kazarikanagushi (craftsman for metal ornament) is divided into omotekanagushi (in charge of outside embrowned metal fittings) and uchikanagushi (in charge of glided or not glided metal fittings of shoji (a paper sliding door) and of the inside).

sen.j: 彦根では仏壇店の業務に組み込まれている最終組立てを専門的に行う「仕立師」が存在する。
sen.e: Shitateshi' exists, who is dedicated solely to final assembly which is incoporated in the work of Buddhist altar shop in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Shitateshi' exists, who are dedicated solely to the final assembly which is incoporated in the work of Buddhist altar shop in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Shitateshi' exists, who are dedicated solely to the final assembly which is incorporated in the work of Buddhist altar shop in Hikone.

sen.j: 詳細は不明。
sen.e: Details are unknown.
Details are unknown.
Details are unknown.

sen.j: 不明
sen.e: Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.
Nothing is clear.

sen.j: 彦根では塗師が行う「蝋色」を専門に行う「蝋色師」が存在する。
sen.e: Roiroshi' exists, who is dedicated solely to 'polish with charcoal' which is conducted by nushi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Roiroshi' who are dedicated solely to 'polish with charcoal' which is conducted by nushi in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
There are 'Roiroshi' who are dedicated solely to 'polish with charcoal' which is conducted by nushi in Hikone.

sen.j: 須弥壇を専門に製作する職人が存在する。
sen.e: A craftsman dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan (An altar made of fine timber, generally with panelling, hame) exists.
There are craftsmen dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan (An altar made of fine timber, generally with panelling, hame).
There are craftsmen dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan (An altar made of fine timber, generally with paneling, hame).

sen.j: 呂色磨きのみを行う専門の職人が存在する。
sen.e: A craftsman dedicated solely to only roiro-migaki (polish) exists.
sen.cmt: 呂色磨き→roiro-migaki (polish)[セルNo. D57にて、「呂色」を'roiro' (polish)と表記しているので、これに合わせた表記としました]
sen.e: There are craftsmen dedicated solely to only roiro-migaki (polish).
There are craftsmen dedicated solely to only roiro-migaki (polishing roiro).

sen.j: 彩色を行う専門の職人が存在する。
sen.e: A craftsman dedicated solely to coloring exists.
There are craftsmen dedicated solely to coloring.
There are craftsmen dedicated solely to coloring.

sen.j: 須弥壇を専門に製作する職人が存在する。
sen.e: A craftsman dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan.
A craftsman dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan.
A craftsman dedicated solely to manufacturing of sumidan.

sen.j: 彦根仏壇での分担とほぼ同じ。
sen.e: The share of workload is almost the same as in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
The share of workload is almost the same as in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.
The share of workload is almost the same as in the case of Hikone Buddhist altar.

sen.j: 箔押しが組立て工程の一部に組み込まれている。
sen.e: Foil-stamping is incorporated in part of assembly process.
Foil-stamping is incorporated in part of the assembly process.
Foil-stamping is incorporated in part of the assembly process.
